# About

**Data-Krauti** is a free tool for exploring tabular data. It is based on HTML5 and operates directly in your browser without any additional installation.

It can load both local and remote files in the formats CSV, JSON, GeoJSON, and TopoJSON and provides tools to explore and customize the data.

If the data contains geographic information Data-Krauti can create a  map  to explore the data in its geographic context and relevance.

**Data-Krauti** is open source and based on **[data.js](https://github.com/gjrichter/data.js)** to load and handle data.

Further on it depends on the following JavaScript Libraries:

- Papa Parse ([https://www.papaparse.com/](https://www.papaparse.com/))
- TopoJSON ([https://github.com/topojson](https://github.com/topojson))
- D3 (https://d3js.org/) (for word clouds in facets tool)
- Bootstrap ([https://getbootstrap.com/](https://getbootstrap.com/))
- jQery ([https://jquery.com/](https://jquery.com/))
